com.seagate.util

Interface Pingable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Host, Subscriber
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnvironmentalChartPanel, FlexstarTray, PingableObject, SubscriberImpl, SubscriberImpl, TrayTypedMessageSubscriber

    public interface Pingable
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface is implemented by the classes that need to support remote pingability

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ping()
      Method called by remote clients to verify that the object is alive and accessible
